instructions: In a bread machine pan, place all ingredients in order suggested by manufacturer. Select basic bread setting. Choose crust color and loaf size if available. Bake according to bread machine directions (check dough after 5 minutes of mixing; add 1 to 2 tablespoons water or flour if needed).
ingredients: 1 cup warm milk (70 to 80 degrees F)
title: Flavorful Herb Bread
